index.php.title: The Enable Project
index.php.desc: A website that shows web developers how to make their work accessible.

button.php.title: Accessible Buttons
button.php.desc: Native HTML5 buttons are the best when you have existing inaccessible code, using roles can help.

pause-anim-control.php.title: Pause Animation Controls
pause-anim-control.php.desc: Instructions on how you can create a global control on you site that pauses animations while respecting your operating animation system settings.
